      • getTableSchemas

        public static java.util.List<DbSchema> getTableSchemas(java.io.InputStream tapSchemaInputStream,
                                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> otherSchemasToAdd)
                                                throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                       org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                       java.io.IOException
        Parses a XML output of a TAP service to obtain the requested table schemas plus the public ones.
        Parameters:
        xml - data to parse
        otherSchemasToAdd - Map with the schema name and alias to show to be searched for.
        Returns:
        a List with the requested schemas plus the public ones.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
